New Records: Darius Garland made history with his stellar performance, but specific records broken are not mentioned
Key Match Events: Darius Garland took over in the fourth quarter to lead the Cavs to victory
The Cavs grabbed a huge win over the Milwaukee Bucks, improving them to 8-0
Post-Match Reflections: Darius Garland said he's feeling extremely confident and thanked his teammates for providing encouragement
Quinn Allen believes this version of Garland is the one who can help Cleveland make a deep playoff run
Donovan Mitchell dropped a strong message to the media after the big win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavs are the only unbeaten team in the Association along with the Thunder
Darius Garland has been averaging nearly 18 points per game on 40% shooting from downtown
Garland suffered a fractured jaw last season and it significantly hurt his availability and even affected his love for the game briefly
